review: Worked exactly as advertised.  Very easy setup.
author: jhoblit

review: It won't stay connected and doesn't work half the time. If I hadn't missed my return window I would be sending it back
author: L. Duff "L Duff"

review: It works great, much enjoyment, I am going to give up cable
author: allie111

review: The reason I gave four star is because it does not have the vudu movies app other than that is great.Hope that in the future there will be an update for the vudu app
author: dennis bourne

review: This is a GREAT gadget!  It could not be simpler to set up and I'm seriously considering dumping my satellite service. My only regret is that I did not buy one of these sooner!
author: Jonathan H. Primm
